MultiFeature.Name: Desert
MultiFeature.Text: Any enemy that ends its turn in your aura takes fire damage equal to 2 + your barbarian level divided by 4.

ResistanceFeature.Name: Storm Soul
ResistanceFeature.Text: You gain resistance to fire damage and don’t suffer the effects of extreme heat.

Feature.Name: Raging Soul
Feature.Text: The ground around you becomes like shifting sand. Any enemy that attempts to move more than 5 feet per turn on the ground while in your aura must make a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). On a failed save, the creature’s speed drops to 0 until the start of its next turn.
